db.description:
Core values: Humility, Integrity, Respect, Responsibility, Focus, Goodness

Overall purpose of the job: The Pizzaiolo is responsible for producing delicious and qualified pizza under instruction from Master Pizzaiolo.

Key activities:

 Prepare authentic handmade artisanal pizza using a stone-hearth oven while maintaining the restaurant’s quality standards
 Strive to develop high quality, innovative and creative pizza menu offerings for our guests
 Develop and follow recipes, portion controls and presentation specification as set by the restaurant
 Follow the FIFO method to maximize freshness
 Assist in food inventory and control while properly receiving and storing delivered items
 Clean food prep areas, equipment, utensils and strictly adhere to sanitation, food safety, hygiene, and other health and safety guidelines
 Other duties or responsibilities as assigned or required
 Updating job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations
 Enhancing department and organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments
 Making sure food is of the right quality and price and is produced on time
 Carry out instructions given by the management team.
db.requirement:
Candidate must possess at least a Certificate/Diploma, College Degree, Hospitality/Tourism/Hotel Management or equivalent.
 Required language(s): English
 At least 6 month(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
 Applicants must be willing to work in 74/6 Hai Ba Trung, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City.
 Preferably Senior Staff/Team Leader/Supervisors specializing in Food/Beverage/Restaurant Service or equivalent.
 3 Full-Time position(s) available.
